# Post-War Surplus of Women
# Area Diverging


> The Second World War created the need for a new generation of female heroes...\
--- Kathryn J. Atwood


***

### Load data [Ingest]

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/surplus-of-women/data.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

colnames(df) <- c("age", "Y1950", "Y2018")
df

```

### Prepare data [Wrangle]

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

df[91:100,2] <- 0

df$Y1950 <- as.numeric(df$Y1950)

```


### Plot [ Views / Temporals ]


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide', fig.width=12, fig.height=6, , fig.align='center', out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
    plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 23, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 18),
    plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 10),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    # axis.text.x = element_text(vjust = 12),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    #panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), # remove minor gridlines
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(), # remove x (vertical) gridlines
    legend.title = element_blank(), # remove legend title
    legend.text = element_text(color = "black", size = 8),
    legend.position='top'
  )


v1 <- ggplot(df) + 
  geom_area(aes(x = age, y = Y2018), fill = '#8395a8', alpha = 0.8)+
  geom_area(aes(x = age, y = Y1950), fill = '#f2d9a2', alpha = 0.8)+
  geom_line(aes(x = age, y = Y1950), color = 'white', size = 1)+
  annotate("text", x = 40, y = 50000, label = "Surplus\nof women\nin 1950", size = 4, colour = "#bb7213", fontface =2)+
  annotate("text", x = 83, y = 50000, label = "Surplus\nof women\nin 2018", size = 4, colour = "#152845", fontface =2)+
   annotate("text", x = 28, y = -12000, label = "Surplus of men\nin 2018", size = 4, colour = "#152845", fontface =2)+
  annotate("text", x = 100, y = -40000, label = "Age", size = 4, colour = "#152845", fontface =2)+
  labs(title = "Surplus of women due to World War fades in Germany, but higher life expectancy\nstill causes a plus of elderly women",
       subtitle = "Differences between number of men and women for each age, in 1950 (yellow) and 2018(blue), in Germany",
       y="", x="",
       caption = "Inspiration: Lisaa Charlotte Rost, Data Wrapper")+
  theme_bw() + 
  theme_opts
  
  
girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 9,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 0.9)))

```


```{r, echo=FALSE}

ggsave(filename = "assets/surplus-of-women.svg", plot = v1, width=16, height=9)

```
